name: Dynamic Materials Corporation
description: Dynamic Materials Corporation, commonly known as BOOM, is a leading global manufacturer specializing in explosive metals fabrication and advanced engineering solutions. Founded in 1965 and headquartered in Boulder, Colorado, the company has established itself as a pioneer in the field of explosive welding, which combines the principles of explosives and metallurgy to create strong, durable metal bonds. BOOM serves a diverse range of industries, including oil and gas, aerospace, defense, and transportation. The company's innovative techniques allow for the creation of complex metal structures and components that are vital for high-performance applications. In addition to explosive welding, Dynamic Materials also offers services such as laser cladding and custom fabrication, enhancing their portfolio of advanced manufacturing capabilities. With a commitment to quality and safety, BOOM adheres to stringent industry standards and regulations, ensuring that its products meet the highest performance criteria. The company continues to invest in research and development to further enhance its technological offerings and maintain its competitive edge in the market. Through its strategic partnerships and a dedicated workforce, Dynamic Materials Corporation aims to drive growth and deliver exceptional value to its customers worldwide.
